data.meta_site_name: Johnny Wright Obituary | March 14, 2018 | Hall Funeral Home - Martin, KY
data.text:
Johnny Wright, age 72, of Prestonsburg, KY, passed away on Wednesday, March 14, 2018 in the Pikeville Medical Center, Pikeville, KY. He was born July 3, 1945 in Prestonsburg, KY, a son of the late George S. and Susie Ousley Wright. He was a retired self employed Contractor.

He is survived by one son, John Alan (Carla) Wright, Prestonsburg, KY, two brothers: Ronnie and Arthur Wright, both of Michigan, two sisters; Dorothy Ratliff and Phyllis Elliott, both of Prestonsburg, KY and one granddaughter, Jada Grace Wright.

In addition to his parents, he was preceded in death by three brothers: Hager, James Earl and Raben Wright.

Funeral service for Johnny Wright will be conducted on Saturday, March 17, 2018 at 11 AM in the Hall Funeral Home Chapel with Mark Tackett officiating. Burial will follow in the Wright Family Cemetery, Prestonsburg, KY. Visitation is after 6 PM Thursday and all day Friday at Hall Funeral Home, Martin, KY.
